chain_of_thought: [Article Type: Case Report] In this article, I found the following liver injury-related lab values and clinical outcomes: The patient is an 83-year-old female with suspected autoimmune hepatitis triggered by Herpes Zoster infection. The text mentions peak lab values from Table 1: AST 398 U/L, ALT 370 U/L, ALP 1232 U/L, GGT 1405 U/L, Total Bilirubin 19.10 mg/dl, Direct Bilirubin 12.4 mg/dl. INR is mentioned as elevated but no specific peak value is provided. Albumin is not mentioned. The clinical outcome is improved/discharged after treatment with acyclovir and valacyclovir.
